title: 4/10/17 - Syria Business...Dragged off a flight...because it's full???
description:
Aftermath of Syria attack ...What is Vladimir Putin up to? ...An outline for how World War III could play out ....Terror attacks at churches ...The strange parameters around a 21st century Easter ...Time to boycott Seattle? ...War is inevitable? ...Neo-cons have taken over The White House?...A doctor is forcibly removed from a flight...in America? ...Jeffy. Late to the party...again! ...Comparing the travel costs o Presidents Obama and Trump

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
